description: Single storey rear extension; rear roof extension (involving conversion of roof space into habitable use); the installation of two rooflights to front roofslope, alterations to side entrance porch and terrace in rear garden
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s) (200-PL(20)P00, 200-PL(20)P01, 200-PL(20)P02, 200-PL(20)P03, 200-PL(10)P00, 200-PL(20)E00, 200-PL(20)E01, 200-PL(20)S00).  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management DPD. | The proposed rooflights in the side elevations of the single storey rear extension hereby approved shall contain only obscure glass (minimum level 3 obscure glazed) and permanently fixed shut. The rooflights so approved shall be retained permanently.  REASON: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties, in accordance with policy 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management DPD. | No part of the roof of the extensions shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with policy 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management DPD. | The proposed terrace hereby approved in the rear garden shall not be higher than 300mm above natural ground level.  REASON: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties, in accordance with in accordance with policy 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management DPD.
